title: Sprawling, renovated 4 bedroom waiting for Columbia students
map_address: Broadway near West 122nd Street and La Salle Street
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 236908247', 'Rent: $4,800 / Month', 'Beds: 4', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 07/31/2022', 'Pet: Negotiable', 'Returning to School?', "You'll need not only an apartment, but an incredible, sprawling apartment just minutes from the Columbia campus to the start the academic year right.", 'And this is that apartment.', 'In a well-maintained pre-war building, featuring stainless steel appliances, including dishwasher, granite countertops, hardwood floors, gut renovated kitchen and bath this is student living in style and comfort.', 'Just steps from the 1 train stop at 125th,  a few blocks from the A,B,C,D trains, and a 12-minutes walk from Fu Foundation Engineering School, transit options abound.', 'Pets negotiable.', 'Guarantors accepted.', 'Virtual Tours available.', '-- Stainless Steel Appliances', '-- Dishwasher', '-- Marble Bath', '-- Granite Countertops', '-- Ample closet space', '-- Hardwood Floors', 'Morningside Heights is built around the gorgeous main campus of Columbia University.', 'The neighborhood is sandwiched between Riverside Park, Morningside Park and home to 4th largest Cathedral in the world.', 'Rounded out with shops, restaurants and cafes on the main strip, Broadway.', 'Areas of Interest: Columbia University, Riverside Park, Morningside Park, The Cathedral of St. John the Divine, Dinosaur BBQ, Fairway Food Market, Manhattan School of Music.', 'Call, email, text Gesha-Marie @ 646.239.7412']
